activity_type.description: See https://docs.alpaca.markets/api-documentation/api-v2/account-activities/#activity-types for a list of possible values.

id.description: An id for the activity. Always in “::” format. Can be sent as page_token in requests to facilitate the paging of results.

symbol.description: The symbol of the security involved with the activity. Not present for all activity types.

qty.description: For dividend activities, the number of shares that contributed to the payment. Not present for other activity types.
